definitions.definition: One who holds bailed property ; one who takes possession of the property of another (called a bailor ) in order to keep that property safe for the other.
A person who is granted bail.

main_definition: ( law ) One who holds bailed property ; one who takes possession of the property of another (called a bailor ) in order to keep that property safe for the other.
secondary_definitions: A person who is granted bail.
